titleStmt.title: Liquor alchahest, or, A discourse of that immortal dissolvent of Paracelsus & Helmont it being one of those two wonders of art and nature, which radically dissolves all animals, vegitables, and minerals into their principles, without being in the least alter'd, either in weight or activity, after a thousand dissolutions, &c. / Published by J.A. pyrophilus.
titleStmt.author: Starkey, George, 1627-1665.
J. A., Pyrophilus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. & N.T. for W. Cademan ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Starkey. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Glasgow University Library.
